abstract: Pres Obama, in televised address, reassures American public that their Thanksgiving holiday celebrations can take place without fear of terrorist attacks; subtext of address is president's falling approval rate in relation to his plans for combating Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: President Obama said there was no specific or credible intelligence of a terrorist plot and told Americans to enjoy the holiday weekend without undue fear.

headline.main: Obama Seeks to Reassure Skeptical Public on ISIS Fight
headline.print_headline: Obama Seeks to Reassure Skeptical Public on ISIS Fight

snippet: President Obama said there was no specific or credible intelligence of a terrorist plot and told Americans to enjoy the holiday weekend without undue fear.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
